alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 5:22PM EDT until May 16 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dickenson County in southwestern Virginia... Southern Buchanan County in southwestern Virginia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 521 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Haysi, moving east at 55 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR HAYSI. HAZARD...90 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged or destroyed. Homes and businesses will have substantial roof and window damage. Expect extensive tree damage and power outages. * Locations impacted include... Clintwood, Grundy, Haysi, Davenport, John Flannagan Lake, Trammel, Clinchco, Nora, Vansant, McClure and Oakwood. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...90 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
